Detailed Description

Provides additional information regarding a CSLLight.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum CSLLightInfo::EFallofMode
 

Defines the various fallof modes.

Enumeration values:
SI_LINEAR  Linear
SI_EXPONENT  Use exponent type
